title: Falcons assistant LaTroy Lewis fired amid sexual assault allegations
desc: The Atlanta Falcons dismissed LaTroy Lewis from his role as assistant defensive line coach Friday after sexual assault allegations surfaced against him, the team announced.

title: Musk bashes OpenAI in deposition, saying 'nobody committed suicide because of Grok'
desc: In his lawsuit against OpenAI, Musk touted xAI safety compared with ChatGPT. A few months later, xAI's Grok flooded X with nonconsensual nude images.

title: Trump claimed Iran is building missiles that could soon hit the US. Sources say that’s not backed up by US intelligence.
desc: When US President Donald Trump addressed the American people on Tuesday night, he claimed that Iran is “working to build missiles that will soon reach the United States of America.”

title: College of Family Physicians of Canada calls on Ottawa to increase support for family doctors
desc: The College of Family Physicians of Canada is urging the government to reduce administrative burdens and barriers for family physicians so that they can deliver better patient care.

title: Marco Rubio orders US officials to stop commentary that could strain Iran talks
desc: Exclusive: memo came after Mike Huckabee’s remarks about Israel sparked alarm inside White House

title: SONA 2026: Over 114 galamsey cases pending in courts - Mahama
desc: President John Dramani Mahama has disclosed that more than 140 case dockets involving hundreds of accused persons in illegal mining (galamsey) activities are currently pending before courts across the country.

title: How the killing of beloved Brazil street dog Orelha exposed deep societal scars
desc: As street dog’s death sparks protests, Brazilians see not just cruelty but familiar shadow of system protecting the well‑connected

title: Upset alert: Montenegro stun Greece in Athens
desc: For only the second time ever, Montenegro defeated Greece, surviving a potential game-tying attempt at the buzzer

title: The battery that divided Narrabri: How misinformation derailed a renewable energy project
desc: A community battery project three years in the making, run by a local not-for-profit and backed by the council, was killed after a spark of misinformation about its fire risk was ignited.

title: NFL Teams' Updated Salary Cap Space for 2026 Free Agency After Record $301.2M Number
desc: The NFL announced Friday that the salary cap for the 2026 season will be a record $301.2 million.
